cookies.title: We use cookies
cookies.description: We use cookies to enhance your experience, analyze site traffic, and personalize content. You can customize your preferences below.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: Essential for the website to function properly. These cannot be disabled.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant and engaging advertisements.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as remembering your preferences.

health.title: Platform Availability
health.tagline: Live view of our core infrastructure. Every bar below represents the last recorded health check. Green means healthy, amber indicates partial degradation, and red points to a service disruption.

how_we_track.title: How we track status
how_we_track.description: Every minute we run automated checks across critical infrastructure. Hereâ€™s what we monitor:

items.api: API heartbeat, database reachability, cache connections.
items.queues: Background queue health, email transport, analytics providers.
items.third_party: Third-party AI services and analytics integrations.

error.title: Unable to reach the status service.
error.developer_hint: Developers: ensure the backend is running at {{url}} before reloading.
error.missing_api: API base URL is not configured.

components_section.title: Component Health
components_section.description: Each card represents a critical dependency. We retain a rolling window of checks so you can spot trends at a glance.

history.title: Incident history
history.description: Recent records captured by our automated checks.
history.error: Unable to load history right now.
history.missing_api: API base URL is not configured.
history.list_description: Browse previous incidents recorded by our automated checks and follow their resolution updates.
history.detail_no_impacted: No components were marked as impacted.

descriptions.critical: Worker queue could not be reached.

hero.title: About FitNudge
hero.subtitle: We're building the future of fitness motivation through AI-powered coaching and community support.

story.title: Our Story
story.subtitle: Born from a simple idea: what if your fitness coach never slept and always knew exactly what to say?
story.description: It's easy to lose focus and motivation when working out. We've all been there â€“ starting the year with ambitious fitness goals, only to find ourselves skipping workouts by February. The gym feels intimidating, personal trainers are expensive, and generic fitness apps just don't understand our unique struggles and motivations. That's where FitNudge came about. We realized that what people really need isn't another workout plan or calorie counter â€“ they need a coach who understands them, believes in them, and is there 24/7 to keep them moving forward. So we set out to build an AI-powered fitness coach that never sleeps, never judges, and always knows exactly what to say to keep you motivated on your journey to better health.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.subtitle: We believe everyone deserves a personal fitness coach that understands their journey and keeps them motivated.

consistency.title: Consistency First
consistency.description: We focus on helping users build lasting habits through consistent motivation and accountability.

ai.title: AI-Powered Coaching
ai.description: Our AI coach learns from your progress and adapts its motivation style to keep you engaged.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: We foster a supportive community where users can share their journey and motivate each other.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: These core values guide everything we do at FitNudge.

privacy.title: Privacy & Security
privacy.description: Your data is protected with enterprise-grade security. We never share your personal information without consent.

community.title: Community First
community.description: We believe in the power of community support and peer motivation to achieve fitness goals.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously innovate to provide the most effective AI-powered fitness coaching experience.

empathy.title: Empathy
empathy.description: We understand that fitness journeys have ups and downs, and we're here to support you through both.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: The passionate people behind FitNudge, working to make fitness motivation accessible to everyone.

founder.name: Alex Johnson
founder.bio: Fitness enthusiast and AI researcher with 10+ years in health tech. Passionate about making fitness accessible to everyone.

cto.name: Sarah Chen
cto.bio: Full-stack engineer and AI specialist. Leads our technical team in building scalable, intelligent fitness solutions.

designer.name: Mike Rodriguez
designer.bio: UX/UI designer focused on creating intuitive, engaging experiences that motivate users to achieve their fitness goals.
